description: The legendary sword that seals the darkness. Its corruption was healed by its time with the Light Dragon. The blade gleams with a sacred luster that can oppose the Demon King.
name: master sword

description: Wooden branches such as this are pretty common, but it's surprisingly well-balanced. It doesn't do much damage, but can serve as a weapon in a pinch.
name: tree branch

description: This torch will stay lit once ignited, but if you put it away, the flame will be extinguished until you light it again.
name: torch

description: A kitchen implement often used for serving delicious soups. It was carved from the wood of a sturdy tree, so it actually packs quite the wallop.
name: soup ladle

description: A decayed wooden boomerang. A useful tool that comes back after you throw it. Its current state has not lessened its performance.
name: boomerang

description: This throwing weapon was originally used by the forest-dwelling Koroks. Its unique shape allows it to return after being thrown.
name: boomerang (new)

description: A boomerang said to have been used by a hero who traveled the Great Sea. It smells faintly of salt water.
name: sea-breeze boomerang

description: An average sword used largely by travelers. The blade has decayed, but it can still serve its purpose.
name: traveler's sword

description: A very common sword often kept by travelers to fend off small beasts. It's fairly durable but a bit unreliable against monsters.
name: traveler's sword (new)

description: A light, thin metal sword used by the guards of Hyrule Castle. Its light weight makes it easy to handle and enables quicker charged attacks.
name: soldier's broadsword

description: A sword brandished by soldiers who once protected Hyrule Castle. Its blade is well tuned for slaying monsters as it enables quicker charged attacks.
name: soldier's broadsword (new)

description: Knights of Hyrule once carried this sword. Even in its decayed state, it shows its true resolve in desperation and can yield powerful attacks when you're down to your last heart.
name: knight's broadsword

description: Knights of Hyrule Castle once carried this sword. It can yield powerful attacks when you're down to your last heart.
name: knight's broadsword (new)

description: A sword gifted to accomplished knights by the royal family. Crafted for sword masters, it increases the power of flurry rush during perfect dodge.
name: royal broadsword

description: The Hyrulean royal family would award this sword to knights who achieved remarkable feats. It increases the power of flurry rush during a perfect dodge.
name: royal broadsword (new)

description: A living, wooden Korok sword with a decayed blade. Bursting materials attached to the tip can be reused again and again.
name: forest dweller's sword

description: Koroks crafted this wooden sword for Hylians. It might not be the best choice for head-on attacks, but bursting materials attached to the tip can be reused again and again.
name: forest dweller's sword (new)

description: A long Zora sword with a decaying blade. Made of a metal favored by the Zora, it yields a high attack power when it gets wet.
name: zora sword

description: A unique sword with a thin blade of Zora design that yields high attack power when wet. This blade takes to water like a Zora.
name: zora sword (new)

description: A double-edged Rito sword with a decayed blade. Swinging it produces a strong wind.
name: feathered edge

description: Rito craftsmen forged this lightweight, double- edged sword so Rito warriors could maneuver quickly in midair. Swinging it produces a strong wind.
name: feathered edge (new)

description: A decaying scimitar from the Gerudo region, it is designed for maximizing force. Attaching a material greatly enhances the material's power but doesn't add as much durability.
name: gerudo scimitar

description: The most commonly used sword in the Gerudo region. Attaching a material greatly enhances the material's power but doesn't add as much durability.
name: gerudo scimitar (new)

description: A famous sword once beloved by the Gerudo Champion Urbosa. It is said that when Urbosa swung this sword in battle, her movements resembled a beautiful dance.
name: scimitar of the seven

description: A single-edged sword of the Sheikah tribe. Its small blade, now decayed, is suited for covert actions and yields more powerful sneakstrikes than ordinary blades.
name: eightfold blade

description: A single-edged sword traditional to the Sheikah tribe. It just may be among the sharpest conventional weapons ever made. It can yield more powerful sneakstrikes.
name: eightfold blade (new)

description: This once-fearsome sword has seen better days. It can do some damage in the right hands but also breaks quickly.
name: rusty broadsword

description: A sword once wielded by a hero in an ancient age. When it's grasped, a strange sense of nostalgia washes over you. Take it when going alone would otherwise be dangerous.
name: sword of the hero

description: A prototypical sword for knights. Its metal may not be as durable as others, but the sword yields massive destructive power just before it breaks.
name: royal guard's sword

description: A weapon made by the Sheikah using ancient technology. Its low durability is a downside, but it yields massive destructive power just before it breaks.
name: royal guard's sword (new)

description: A sword said to have once belonged to a hero from the sky. Its beautiful white blade stands out. When it's wielded, a strange yet heavenly breeze kicks up around you.
name: white sword of the sky

description: A tree branch with an added grip and excellent balance. Equip it, and use it as a weapon.
name: wooden stick

description: A stick made out of a hard tree branch. The tree soaked up lots of sunshine, so it's sturdier than a regular stick and has high durability.
name: sturdy wooden stick

description: A very swingable stick made by honing a dried branch to the proper thickness and length. Its attack power is much greater than that of a normal stick.
name: gnarled wooden stick

description: A curved sword favored by the Lizalfos. It's made of metal so it can safely be used near fire. If you throw it, it will return to you.
name: lizal boomerang

description: A Zonai sword made of zonaite. It resonates with attached Zonai devices to slightly increase its attack power.
name: zonaite sword

description: A strong Zonai sword made of zonaite. It resonates with attached Zonai devices to increase some of its attack power.
name: strong zonaite sword

description: A powerful sword used by Zonai and made of zonaite. It resonates with attached Zonai devices to greatly increase its attack power.
name: mighty zonaite sword

description: A small and intensely magic rod, it's said to have been wielded by an ancient magician who awoke maximum latent power in gems.
name: magic rod

description: A skeletal arm that keeps moving even after it's severed from its body. It's kind of gross to strap it to your back, but it'll do in a pinch. It's old and fragile, so it's quick to break.
name: bokoblin arm

description: The arm of a Stalizalfos that continues to struggle even in death. It can be used as a weapon, but it's very brittle. You can feel it wiggling when you strap it to your back...
name: lizalfos arm

description: This slender sword has an ominous presence. It is said to end the life of anyone it touches. Its gloom will gradually wear down the body of its wielder.
name: gloom sword

description: A farming tool primarily used for tilling fields. Its fine craftsmanship is sturdy enough to withstand backbreaking fieldwork, but its battle applications are untested.
name: farming hoe

description: Made for paddling boats, but it was made sturdy enough to fight strong currents. Maybe it's useful for self-defense in a pinch.
name: boat oar

description: A massive boomerang that is weathered and decayed. It was originally used for hunting, but it can be a challenge to wield. Thrown well, it will come back to the thrower.
name: giant boomerang

description: This massive boomerang requires two hands. Originally used for hunting, it was modified for use as a weapon. The blades on the inner curves make it a bit tricky to wield.
name: giant boomerang (new)

description: A basic two-handed sword once wielded by aspiring adventurers. It's decayed and no longer cuts well, but it can still knock a shield right out of enemies' hands.
name: traveler's claymore

description: A basic two-handed sword once wielded by aspiring adventurers. Its immense weight can knock enemies' shields right out of their hands.
name: traveler's claymore (new)

description: A lightweight metal weapon forged for royal soldiers. It's decayed now, but still easy to wield, so it consumes less stamina during charge attacks.
name: soldier's claymore

description: An improved claymore, made lightweight for easier handling. It consumes less stamina for charged attacks.
name: soldier's claymore (new)

description: A claymore, now decayed, once carried by knights of Hyrule. It resonates with the desire to protect at all costs and can yield powerful attacks when you're down to your last heart.
name: knight's claymore

description: Only the strongest of Hyrule Castle's knights carried this two-handed sword. It can yield powerful attacks when you're down to your last heart.
name: knight's claymore (new)

description: A large sword, now decayed, issued to the royal family's guard. It's tuned for skilled users and yields a powerful flurry rush during a perfect dodge.
name: royal claymore

description: A two-handed sword issued to the Hyrulean royal family's immediate guard detail. Yields a powerful strike and increases the power of flurry rush during perfect dodge.
name: royal claymore (new)

description: A decayed Zora longsword, it's suited for battles near water because it's made of an unusual metal that increases attack power when it's wet.
name: zora longsword

description: A longsword made by the Zora using a special metal. It's rarely used because the Zora prefer to use spears. It yields high attack power when it gets wet.
name: zora longsword (new)

description: In its former state, this hefty weapon knocked out many a foe. Decayed, it still packs a punch and is great for breaking rocks.
name: cobble crusher

description: A Goron-made two-handed weapon. It's made from thick, hard metal and has no cutting edge, but its weight and hard surface make it a great tool for breaking rocks.
name: cobble crusher (new)

description: This two-handed weapon was once wielded by the Goron Champion Daruk. Daruk made swinging it around look easy, but a Hylian would need an immense amount of strength.
name: boulder breaker

description: A legendary greatsword forged by a Goron craftsman for a hero who traveled through time. The exceptionally sharp cutting edge is a testament to the craftsman's mastery.
name: biggoron's sword

description: A two-handed Gerudo sword with a decayed blade. Attaching a material greatly enhances the material's power but doesn't add as much durability.
name: gerudo claymore

description: Only the most talented Gerudo sword fighters carry this two-handed sword. Attaching a material greatly enhances the material's power but doesn't add as much durability.
name: gerudo claymore (new)

description: A longblade that no longer cuts as well as it once did, due to its decayed edge. However, when wielded by a proficient fighter, it cleaves the wind and creates a vacuum.
name: eightfold longblade

description: A single-edged sword seldom seen in Hyrule. This weapon is passed down through the Sheikah tribe. When wielded by a proficient fighter, it cleaves wind and creates vacuum.
name: eightfold longblade (new)

description: A slender claymore thought to have been handed down to the kingdom of Hyrule ages ago. The blade shines with a holy luster.
name: dusk claymore

description: A peculiar greatsword allegedly used by a hero from a world in which the moon threatened to fall. It slashes wildly in battle as if possessed by a Fierce Deity.
name: fierce deity sword

description: A two-handed sword not properly cared for. Although it can be used as a weapon, its durability is very low. Don't expect it to last for more than a few strikes.
name: rusty claymore

description: A decayed claymore prototype for the royal guard. It's made of a metal refined using an unusual method, and it holds massive destructive power just before it breaks.
name: royal guard's claymore

description: The Sheikah used the very essence of ancient technology to forge this greatsword. It's low in durability, but its magic yields massive destructive power just before it breaks.
name: royal guard's claymore (new)

description: A stick cut off from a large tree. It isn't very sturdy, but its heavier end can swat a shield away.
name: thick stick

description: A solid stick cut from the crooked branch of a tough tree. It has high durability, despite the way it looks.
name: sturdy thick stick

description: A stick cut from a tree trunk. It's been dried to increase its hardness. It has high attack power for something made of wood.
name: gnarled thick stick

description: A large sword used by the Zonai and made of zonaite. It resonates with attached Zonai devices to slightly increase its attack power.
name: zonaite longsword

description: A strong, large sword used by the Zonai and made of zonaite. It resonates with attached Zonai devices to increase some of its attack power.
name: strong zonaite longsword

description: A powerful, large sword used by Zonai and made of zonaite. It resonates with attached Zonai devices to greatly increase its attack power.
name: mighty zonaite longsword

description: A long and mysterious magical rod, it's said to have been wielded by an ancient magician who awoke the latent power of gems.
name: magic scepter

description: A Moblin bone that continues to move even after being detached from its body. The bone is thick enough to be used as a weapon but is extremely brittle and easily broken.
name: moblin arm

description: A metal stick filled with madness and symbolic of doom. Its forceful strike can smash an object to pieces. Its gloom will gradually wear down the body of its wielder.
name: gloom club

description: Just a mop to the untrained eye, it excels at tidying up the place. But it owes its sturdy construction to a true craftsman, so it actually has some combat merit.
name: wooden mop

description: A farming tool used to collect hay efficiently. It's light enough to be used by anyone. The four prongs are very sharp.
name: farmer's pitchfork

description: A fisherman's tool that excels at catching large fish. Its particularly sharp spearhead makes it valuable as a weapon as well.
name: fishing harpoon

description: A spear for throwing with a decayed tip. Lost its sharpness, but kept the balance perfect for throwing, enabling you to throw it very far.
name: throwing spear

description: A specialized spear weighted to excel as a throwing weapon. It's perfectly balanced to be thrown farther than your average spear, able to pierce targets from a great distance.
name: throwing spear (new)

description: An average spear carried by travelers for protection. It's decayed and doesn't cut well, but the shape makes it easy for anyone to handle.
name: traveler's spear

description: A spear used mainly by travelers to fend off wolves and other beasts. It's easy to hold and simple to use.
name: traveler's spear (new)

description: Although now decayed, this lightweight metal spear was made for royal soldiers. Because it's light and easy to handle, it enables quicker charged attacks.
name: soldier's spear

description: A long spear once used by the guards of Hyrule Castle. Easy to use but difficult to master. Enables quicker charged attacks.
name: soldier's spear (new)

description: Now decayed, this halberd was made for knights of Hyrule. It reflects their courage in defending the kingdom. It can yield powerful attacks when you're down to your last heart.
name: knight's halberd

description: A spear used by knights adept in mounted combat. The spearhead is modeled after an axe. It can yield powerful attacks when you're down to your last heart.
name: knight's halberd (new)

description: Although now decayed, this spear was once given to knights who guarded critical areas of Hyrule Castle. It enables a powerful flurry rush during a perfect dodge.
name: royal halberd

description: This spear was issued to the knights who guarded Hyrule Castle's throne room. It yields a powerful flurry rush during a perfect dodge.
name: royal halberd (new)

description: A Korok spear with a decayed tip. It's still full of vitality. Bursting materials attached to the spearhead can be reused again and again.
name: forest dweller's spear

description: The Koroks made this spear for Hylians. The shaft is made from a light, sturdy wood. Bursting materials attached to the spearhead can be reused again and again.
name: forest dweller's spear (new)

description: A Zora spear with a decayed point. It's made of a water-resistant metal and yields a high attack power when it gets wet.
name: zora spear

description: This spear is a Zora's weapon of choice. It's made from a special metal and is used by the Zora for both fishing and protecting home. It yields high attack power when it gets wet.
name: zora spear (new)

description: A spear of peerless grace cherished by the Zora Champion Mipha. Although Mipha specialized in healing abilities, her spearmanship was in a class all its own.
name: lightscale trident

description: A spear used by Rito soldiers, its point is now decayed. It still boasts quick attacks in midair, and it produces a strong wind.
name: feathered spear

description: Its lightweight design is a hallmark of Rito craftsmanship. It gives Rito warriors more maneuverability during aerial combatand it produces a strong wind.
name: feathered spear (new)

description: A Gerudo spear with a decayed blade that is designed to draw force to its tip. Attaching a material greatly enhances the material's power but doesn't add as much durability.
name: gerudo spear

description: This spear was used widely by the Gerudo soldiers. Attaching a material greatly enhances the material's power but doesn't add as much durability.
name: gerudo spear (new)

description: A rusty polearm likely used by knights from an age past. The spearhead is in bad shape due to prolonged exposure to the elements, so its durability is low.
name: rusty halberd

description: A prototype spear wielded by knights. It's made from a special metal with low durability, but which yields massive destructive power just before it breaks.
name: royal guard's spear

description: This Sheikah-made spear was created using ancient technology. It has poor durability, but the magic it contains yields massive destructive power just before it breaks.
name: royal guard's spear (new)

description: A long stick fashioned from a tree branch. Its straight shape makes it work well as a lunging weapon.
name: long stick

description: A long, durable stick made from a branch with good piercing power. It has high durability because it comes from the hardest part of the tree.
name: sturdy long stick

description: A long stick made bumpy at one end when its shoots were cut off. It has higher attack power than a normal stick.
name: gnarled long stick

description: A Zonai spear made of zonaite. It resonates with attached Zonai devices to slightly increase its attack power.
name: zonaite spear

description: A tough spear used by the Zonai. It is highly durable. It resonates with attached Zonai devices to increase some of its attack power.
name: strong zonaite spear

description: A powerful Zonai spear made of zonaite. It resonates with attached Zonai devices to greatly increase its attack power.
name: mighty zonaite spear

description: A long rod with a bit of magic, it's said to have been wielded by an ancient magician who awoke the latent power of gems.
name: magic staff

description: A spear whose ominous appearance strikes fear into hearts. It is said to cost its bearer a part of their soul because its gloom will gradually wear down the body of its wielder.
name: gloom spear

description: A common arrow. Its shaft was carved from the wood of a sturdy tree.
name: arrow

description: A wooden bow from the olden days. It's built for hunting, but it's not very powerful.
name: old wooden bow

description: This wooden bow may not be the most reliable for battling monsters, but it is excellent for hunting small animals.
name: wooden bow

description: A small bow used by travelers for protection. It doesn't do a lot of damage, but it can be used to attack foes from a distance.
name: traveler's bow

description: A bow designed for armed conflict. Inflicts more damage than a civilian bow, but it will still burn if it touches fire.
name: soldier's bow

description: The sturdy metal construction of this bow offers superior durability, while its lack of firing quirks makes it quite reliable. Once favored by the knights at Hyrule Castle.
name: knight's bow

description: In the past, the king of Hyrule presented this bow to only the most talented archers in the land. Its combat capabilities are as impressive as its extravagant design.
name: royal bow

description: The Koroks made this bow for Hylians. It's crafted from flexible wood and uses sturdy vines for the bowstring. Its construction may be simple, but it fires multiple arrows at once.
name: forest dweller's bow

description: A bow favored by the Zora for fishing. It doesn't boast the highest firepower, but the special metal it's crafted from prioritizes durability.
name: zora bow

description: This bow is a favorite among Rito warriors. The bowstring has been specially engineered for aerial combat, which allows it to be drawn faster than a normal bow.
name: swallow bow

description: A highly refined Rito-made bow created by a master Rito craftsman. Rito warriors favor it for its superior rate of fire, which helps them excel even further at aerial combat.
name: falcon bow

description: A bow without equal wielded by the Rito Champion, Revali. It's said Revali could loose arrows with the speed of a gale, making him supreme in aerial combat.
name: great eagle bow

description: This Gerudo-made bow is popular for the fine ornamentations along its limbs. Designed for hunting and warfare alike, this bow was engineered to strike distant targets.
name: gerudo bow

description: A bow passed down through the Sheikah tribe. Concentrating before drawing the string will allow you to target distant enemies as easily as those nearby.
name: phrenic bow

description: This prototype Sheikah-made bow was designed to fight the Great Calamity. Made with ancient technology, it boasts a high rate of fire and firepower but has low durability.
name: royal guard's bow

description: A bow that's been in the royal family for ages. Said to have been used by a princess who fought beasts of twilight. It forcefully fires long-range arrows.
name: dusk bow

description: A basic Bokoblin bow made of wood. It's made by taking any tree branch and just tying a string to either end, so don't expect much in the way of combat effectiveness.
name: boko bow

description: An upgraded Boko bow bound with animal bone to boost its durability and firepower. Its craftsmanship is sloppy, but it's light and easy to use.
name: spiked boko bow

description: A Boko bow reinforced by fossils. Bokoblins handpicked the materials it's made from, so it boasts a respectable firepower.
name: dragonbone boko bow

description: A wooden bow created by Lizalfos. It's reinforced by the bones of a large fish a marked improvement over any standard wooden bow.
name: lizal bow

description: A Lizal bow with a grip reinforced by metal. The body is made from the branches of a flexible tree that grows near water, which offers some serious destructive power.
name: strengthened lizal bow

description: This bow is wielded by Lizalfos who are expert marksmen. The metal that reinforces much of the weapon adds some additional weight but offers heightened durability.
name: steel lizal bow

description: A Lynel-made bow crafted from rough metal. True to the vicious nature of Lynel weaponry, it fires a spread of multiple arrows at once. Ideal for taking down quick-moving targets.
name: lynel bow

description: This massive Lynel bow sports a bowstring made from a metal so tough, mere Hylians have trouble drawing it back.
name: mighty lynel bow

description: This Lynel bow is made from a special steel found at the peak of Death Mountain. It has tremendous stopping power and can pierce thick armor as easily as thin paper.
name: savage lynel bow

description: A bow favored by the skilled archers of the Yiga Clan. It's been engineered to fire two arrows at once to ensure your target comes to a swift and none-too-pleasant halt.
name: duplex bow

description: A bow used by a Captain Construct. Though simply built, it is made of fireproof materials and won't catch fire as wooden bows do.
name: construct bow

description: A sturdy bow for a Captain Construct. Besides being fireproof, it's been strengthened to allow for more powerful shots.
name: strong construct bow

description: A powerful bow for a Captain Construct. Though still fireproof, it's more complex than earlier models. The bowstring is extremely tense and requires great strength to draw.
name: mighty construct bow

description: A Zonai bow that draws power from your Energy Cell. Power drains, and arrows can fly much farther according to how long a shot is charged.
name: zonaite bow

description: A magical bow prized by the Demon King. Its performance reflects the power of its wielder. The higher your maximum number of hearts, the more its attack power increases.
name: demon king's bow

description: A shield passed down through the Hyrulean royal family, along with the legend of the hero who wielded it. Its defensive capabilities and durability outshine all other shields.
name: hylian shield

description: The lid of a large soup pot. It smells vaguely of poultry broth... Yum! It can take quite a beating before breaking.
name: pot lid

description: An aged, worn-out wooden shield. It can withstand lighter attacks, such as arrows.
name: old wooden shield

description: This lightweight, simple shield is ideal for less experienced fighters. It can withstand light attacks, but blocking stronger blows is not recommended.
name: wooden shield

description: This shield features a traditional design from Necluda. Its combat capabilities aren't much better than the standard wooden shield, but it found popularity for its design.
name: emblazoned shield

description: Favored by hunters for its rabbit design, which is said to bring luck on hunts. It's easy to use, but its durability leaves something to be desired.
name: hunter's shield

description: Often carried by fishermen for its fish design, which represents hope for a great catch. Its light wooden construction makes it convenient to take onto a boat.
name: fisherman's shield

description: A sturdy shield loved by many an adventurer. It is made of animal hide and sturdy wood and is best suited to defending against weak monsters or animals.
name: traveler's shield

description: A shield once used by the guards of Hyrule Castle. It's easy to handle, but its core is made of wood, so it can catch fire.
name: soldier's shield

description: A shield favored by the knights who served the Hyrulean royal family. Its sturdy metal construction makes it quite durable, but its weight requires decent skill to wield.
name: knight's shield

description: A shield issued to the Hyrulean royal family's immediate guard detail. It boasts a high defense, but these days it's more a collector's item due to its ornamentation.
name: royal shield

description: The Koroks made this shield specifically for Hylians. It's made from the finest hard wood of trees that grow only in Korok Forest, so it's sturdier than it looks.
name: forest dweller's shield

description: A Zora-made shield adorned with intricate ornamentation. It's said that true masters of this shield can redirect attacks as a rock redirects rushing water.
name: zora shield

description: Rito warriors cherish this shield. Its unique shape is designed with midbattle flight in mind to facilitate aerial combat.
name: kite shield

description: The design of this metal shield has changed over time to match the Gerudo's sword-and- shield fighting style. It's favored by soldiers and travelers alike.
name: gerudo shield

description: This extravagant shield is presented to Gerudo warriors who rise to the rank of captain. Its apparent opulence is rivaled only by its combat capabilities.
name: radiant shield

description: This shield was cherished by the Gerudo Champion Urbosa. The gold used to make it was handpicked to ensure a design that is both lightweight and very durable.
name: daybreaker

description: A small Sheikah-made shield. Its design is intended to decrease blind spots without sacrificing too much defense.
name: shield of the mind's eye

description: A shield said to have been the favorite of a hero who traveled the open seas. It was apparently a family heirloom, passed down through many generations.
name: sea-breeze shield

description: It's likely this rusty old shield once belonged to a knight. It still has some defensive capabilities, but its usefulness has been worn down by time.
name: rusty shield

description: This shield was forged using ancient Sheikah technology. It boasts extremely high stopping power, but its structural weakness made its low durability impractical for combat.
name: royal guard's shield

description: A Bokoblin-made shield created by attaching a handhold to any flat tree bark picked up off the ground. It's pretty shoddy, so don't expect it to last very long.
name: boko shield

description: A Boko shield made of slightly stronger wood and reinforced with animal bones.
name: spiked boko shield

description: This Boko shield is reinforced with fossilized bone. Its defensive capabilities are respectable, but its predictably slipshod craftsmanship spells low durability.
name: dragonbone boko shield

description: A common shield found among the Lizalfos. It's made of metal, but its sloppy craftsmanship offers poor durability.
name: lizal shield

description: This Lizal shield has been strengthened by adding a different type of metal to the mix. The edge is lined with spikes, so handle with care.
name: reinforced lizal shield

description: This Lizal shield is adorned with several metal shells as a means of reinforcement. Its defensive capabilities are high, but its weight requires a skilled soldier to bear.
name: steel lizal shield

description: A shield used by Zonai and made of zonaite. It lowers the energy consumption of an attached Zonai device.
name: zonaite shield

description: A shield used by Zonai and made of zonaite. It is moderately durable and lowers the energy consumption of an attached Zonai device.
name: strong zonaite shield

description: A shield used by Zonai and made of zonaite. It is very durable and draws on its stored energy to more efficiently use an attached Zonai device.
name: mighty zonaite shield

description: A sturdy shield favored by Lynels for its defensive and offensive capabilities. First and foremost a shield, but the bladed edges can deal slashing attacks when deflecting.
name: lynel shield

description: This Lynel-made shield has been reinforced with armor and even more blades. Stronger in both defense and offense, it can tear through basic armor when deflecting.
name: mighty lynel shield

description: This ultimate Lynel shield is favored by the White-Maned Lynels. It excels at defending against even the most brutal of attacks and cutting down powerful foes when deflecting.
name: savage lynel shield
